about_the_game:
Welcome to Cursedland! It's a blood-pumping, action-filled platformer experience bursting to the brim with humor, chaos, and memes.

The game is an original title where every jump and step is part of the experience. In Cursedland, you will maneuver floating platforms, dodge traps, and stomp on enemies only to encounter a surreal world full of hilarious and demanding surprises.

Your job is to flee the cursed realm. Rely on your precision and reflexes and shield that mask from the corrupting power of Cursedland.

Features:

Fast-paced action on classic platforming concepts with an added zest of humor.

Three levels to play and veil up a gruesome mix of challenges to test anyone’s skill set for demo purposes.

Unique enemies with attack patterns that you will need to master to survive.

An artistic and retro aesthetic fused with a modern twist.

Simple but precise controls that fully complement the sophisticated level designs with a mix of strategy and precision.

name: Cursedland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-12100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
